column4: hassanakevazril: Must be a bad config? I have spoken with many people who do the PSubuntu setup and have never heard of that
hassanakevazril: Have you considered going to the PSUbuntu websites/forums?
hassanakevazril: I am running intrepid, I see no need for jaunty on the PS3
Usually something like: sudo ifconfig eth0 up && sudo dhclient eth0
